entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
